title: LIV Golf Threw a Sport Into Chaos. It Also Changed It.
description: The Saudi-backed golf series, which will expand next year, has forced the PGA Tour to redesign its economic model. The drama between the two golf entities seems far from over.
dc:creator: Alan Blinder
media:description: Phil Mickelson is one of the big-name PGA Tour stars who have joined LIV Golf. “I love the side that I’m on,” he said.
